headline: Assessing Nucor (NUE) Valuation After A Strong Three Month Share Price Run
summary: Why Nucor Is Back On Investors’ Radar Nucor (NUE) is drawing fresh attention after a strong past 3 months, with the stock up about 23%, even as the past week and month have brought modest pullbacks. For investors watching materials and steel names, the recent move, together with Nucor’s latest annual revenue of US$32.5b and net income of US$1.7b, is prompting closer scrutiny of how the current share price around US$183 lines up with fundamentals.
